title: Repair shop graphic
content:
Two fonts to identify please. This is the final one for now!

Many thanks,

Steve

Font: 

 Matinee Gothic/Elephantman 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190533/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [repair shop.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190533/http:/typophile.com/files/repair%20shop.JPG) | 22.79 KB |
author: Kilgore Trout 23

comments.content:
Your sample is awfully small, but I think |DAYTONA BEACH, FL| may be Matinee Gothic:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-matinee-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-matinee-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-matinee-gothic/")

|REPAIR SHOP| appears to be Elephantman, by Comicraft:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/elephantmen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/elephantmen/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/elephantmen/")
despite the small sample (sorry abt that), chalked up as 'solved'...thank you for your help!
